WRITING.TITLE: Necropolis queries
WRITING.TEXT: So I'm working towards a new necropolis team and have 3 units sitting at 4*. I wanted to get some opinions from here before proceeding. I'm currently sitting on: Shihwa with no skill ups, Stella with no skill ups and Tarq with all skills maxed. Which of the three would be most useful against the lich? As an additional question, is stella`s 3rd skill effected by the lich speed cap? Also has anyone tried out the samurai`s supreme skywolf skill against him to see if it goes through the shield?

WRITING.TITLE: Necropolis focused shihwa
WRITING.TEXT: So after asking on here last night I've built up my Shihwa a bit, and now with free rune removal I'm trying to get her runes properly. I've decided to go with violent revenge but I'm not sure about her 2/4/6. Should I go tank and straight hp? Or at or a hybrid? Just looking for some opinions.

WRITING.TITLE: Which light too 6* next?
WRITING.TEXT: I'd like some opinions on which of my three Light mons too 6* for the rewards pack. I've got a 5* skill maxed Ahman. A 5* skill maxed Darion and 3* completely unskilled Elpuria. I'm hesitant on Ahman since I've got a skilled violent chasun 6* already. What would you suggest.

WRITING.TITLE: Paint for the figures.
WRITING.TEXT: Im thinking about breaking down and painting atleast the bosses. Where is the best place to pick up citadel paints besides online. Im on west coast of the US.

WRITING.TITLE: Retail mega bosses.
WRITING.TEXT: Im aware the regular backer stretch goals are pushed back to october. But i cant get a clear answer as to whether the retail exclusives are pushed back as well. Does anyone know about this?

WRITING.TITLE: Varnish question.
WRITING.TEXT: Ive been painting my set of figures. Was wondering what varnish i should use on them, i want something matte as glossy would just feel wrong here.

WRITING.TITLE: Paint color questions.
WRITING.TEXT: Im relatively new to painting miniatures. I was wondering what greens I should use to get the rusted copper look for the gargoyle armor bits. Also if there is a good ice/electric/crystal blue for the outrider knights eyes and sword. Any suggestions appreciated.

WRITING.TITLE: Honest opinion?
WRITING.TEXT: Im very excited to try this game out but i missed the KS. Is it worth paying the mark up on ebay or should i just wait till aug/sept and try and snag a 1.5 edition from the webstore? Edit: Thanks for all the input. I guess i will wait for a 1.5 copy. Are there any expansions i should purchase in preparation?

WRITING.TITLE: Blood plasma weapons.
WRITING.TEXT: So looking at some of the items that come with certain miniatures. I came across the blood plasma gun and katana that come with the sci-fi white speaker. Are these items as potentially over powered as they appear. If not why? Im new to KDM and do not have a copy yet but im grabbing expansions and extras as i find them. Curious if these are worth acquiring.

WRITING.TITLE: Good price for gorm and flower knight?
WRITING.TEXT: Im intrigued by these two expansions but as they are out of stock, secondary market is my only option. What would you folks consider an acceptable price for these?

WRITING.TITLE: Adding promo gear
WRITING.TEXT: Im wonderimg how one would go about adding in some of the promo gear/items. Percival looks like it adds a hunt event for the new fighting art and the white speaker adds an event to buy from her. What about before/after the wall or any of the other ones that dont add an event?

WRITING.TITLE: WTB Flower knight expansion.
WRITING.TEXT: Looking to buy a flower knight expansion. Would prefer unbuilt but im open to anything in good condition with all game content.

WRITING.TITLE: Question about forgeworld necron gauss pylon
WRITING.TEXT: Im having a hard time deciphering exactly what model on the Forge World site is supposed to be the gauss pylon. They have the Necron pylon and two sentry pylons. But nothing that lists any of them as the gauss pylon from the forgeworld index. Can someone shed some light for me?

WRITING.TITLE: Requirements for heavy destroyers.
WRITING.TEXT: So the index says i can upgrade one my destroyers to a heavy destroyer if i have three in my unit. My question is do i need a physical model to do this? As far as i can tell heavy destroyers arent something i can buy as a kit and the "online only" upgrade kit is out of stock. Can i denote which is the heavy with markings or am i SOL till a restock?(Im new to 40k btw)

WRITING.TITLE: 50 power level necron list.
WRITING.TEXT: Any suggestions on what to build for necrons at 50pl/1000 points that doesnt involve the deciever or nemesor zandrekh?

WRITING.TITLE: Deciver and DD ark
WRITING.TEXT: Does teleporting with grand illusion count as movement for the restriction on firing the doomsday arks highpower profile?

WRITING.TITLE: Transport questions.
WRITING.TEXT: Im new to the hobby and was wondering what everyone uses to transport their armies. Im currently debating a storage tub with bubble wrap but there has to be better options. Edit: specifically transporting necrons.

WRITING.TITLE: Question about strategems.
WRITING.TEXT: So the battle for Konor event is giving out strategem cards. How do i use these for normal games and can any army use them?

WRITING.TITLE: Case choice.
WRITING.TEXT: Citadel channel foam or the unit cut battlefoam. Just want peoples opinions.
